list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: direct one's gaze toward someone or something or in a specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mọi người đang nhìn anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: think of or regard in a specified way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I look at tennis differently from some coaches
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi nhìn vào quần vợt khác với một số huấn luyện viên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have the appearance or give the impression of being.
rely on to do or provide something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she will look to you for help
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy sẽ tìm đến bạn để được giúp đỡ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of directing one's gaze in order to see someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: let me get a closer look
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hãy để tôi nhìn kỹ hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the appearance of someone or something, especially as expressing a particular quality.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bedraggled look of the village
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cái nhìn lộng lẫy của làng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: used to call attention to what one is going to say.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: "Hãy nhìn xem, đây là vô lý."
